generator:
1 { topicOf(W, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- workshop(W).
1 { scheduled(W, R, S, D) : room(R), slot(S), day(D) } :- workshop(W).

hard_constraints.description: Ensure that no more than one workshop is scheduled in the same room at the same time on any given day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(W1, R, S, D), scheduled(W2, R, S, D), W1 != W2.

hard_constraints.description: Each room is strictly limited to a maximum of two workshop sessions per day to ensure at least one slot remains unused.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- room(R), day(D), C = #count { W, S : scheduled(W, R, S, D) }, C > 2.

hard_constraints.description: Room 2 must remain empty during the afternoon time slots on both scheduled days.
Workshops focusing on Artificial Intelligence are restricted to morning sessions and cannot be scheduled at any other time.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W, "AI"), scheduled(W, R, S, D), S != "morning".

hard_constraints.description: Mathematics workshops are prohibited from overlapping in time; no two math sessions can occur simultaneously, even in different rooms.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W1, "Math"), topicOf(W2, "Math"), (W1, R1) != (W2, R2), scheduled(W1, R1, S, D), scheduled(W2, R2, S, D).

hard_constraints.description: To prevent scheduling conflicts between departments, Artificial Intelligence and Biology workshops are not allowed to share the same room on the same day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- topicOf(W1, "AI"), topicOf(W2, "Bio"), scheduled(W1, R, S1, D), scheduled(W2, R, S2, D).

hard_constraints.description: Every subject—AI, Math, and Biology—must be represented by at least one workshop on each of the two days.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- day(D), topic(T), C = #count { W, R, S : topicOf(W, T), scheduled(W, R, S, D) }, C = 0.

soft_constraints.description: We prefer a schedule that uses space efficiently by minimizing the number of idle or unused room-time slots.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
occupied(R, S, D) :- scheduled(W, R, S, D).
penalty("idle", (R, S, D), 1) :- room(R), slot(S), day(D), not occupied(R, S, D).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, R, S, D : penalty("idle", (R, S, D), Cost) }.
